page.title: 04Housing
page.content: One of the main assets of an area is its housing stock and the conditions of such houses also provides a good indicator as to the general health of the residents. Our block contains about 23,000 homes;about 70% terraced houses,many built in the early 1900's, and semi-detached houses mainly built in the 1930's and most privately owned.There are several estates in Netherton built in the 1960's and 1970's. There are about 8,000 owner occupied properties,about 10,000 properties rented from the council and the remainder rented from private landlords. Ten General Improvement Areas and Housing Action Areas have been declared in the Bootle area and in 1984 about 2,000 improvement grants were issued.
